text: Miyo, anata gata wa, arrā no michi no tame ni (shoyū suru mono no ichibu no) hodokoshi o motome rareru nodearu. Sorenanoni anata gata no nakaniha, don'yokuna mono ga iru. Daga don'yokuna mono wa, tada jibun no tamashī o son'u dakedearu. Arrā wa jisoku sa rete iruga, anata gata wa mazushī. Moshimo anata gata ga somuki sarunaraba, kare wa anata gata igai no min o kawari ni tate rareyou. Sorera wa anata gata to dōyōde wanaidearou
